overview: "My name is Laure. My story really began at the age of eighteen when I was sharing a small suburban house with my sister Claudia. The first time I saw a couple making love..." This is how Laure's burning confession starts, a young woman with an angel face and a pure heart, who will soon face the real things of life..
tagline: Don’t be fooled! She may look sweet, angelic and shy but that won’t last long!
title: The Fever of Laure
